page.title: 10Transport Thornley Knowle Gn
page.content:
Most of the Roads in the area are unclassified, except for the B.6243 from Longridge to Clitheroe, which passes through Knowle Green. There is a two-hourly bus-service from Preston to Clitheroe along this road, and a similar service runs from Preston to Chipping through Thornley. There is at present some worry about whether the projected privatisation of bus services will cause hardship in the area, although most of the families are car-owners. Taxis take rural children to school.
Local business also transport their employees to and from work owing to the lack of public transport.
